external_references.description: DFIR Report. (2021, November 29). CONTInuing the Bazar Ransomware Story. Retrieved September 29, 2022.

description: During [C0015](https://attack.mitre.org/campaigns/C0015), the threat actors used [Conti](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0575) ransomware to encrypt a compromised network.(Citation: DFIR Conti Bazar Nov 2021)
